row.content: create table smp_refund ( crm_remit_number VARCHAR2(50),dr NUMBER(10,0) default 0,performance_date CHAR(10),pk_course VARCHAR2(50),pk_director VARCHAR2(50),pk_parter CHAR(20),pk_refund VARCHAR2(50) not null,pk_team CHAR(20),remit_amount VARCHAR2(50),remit_company VARCHAR2(50),remit_name VARCHAR2(50),ts CHAR(19) default to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
